Posts.Content: susanlouise wrote: Can anyone share their experiences going back to gym after DIEP flap? I am 3 weeks out and definitely not ready, but...! My surgeon indicated 6 weeks. I was doing weighted squats, dead lifts, push ups, etc etc. Anybody got a comment or advice? Thx Susan Dx 2/2011, DCIS, Left, <1cm, Stage 0, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Dx 6/2018, IDC, Left, 3cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Hormonal Therapy Aromasin (exemestane) Hormonal Therapy Arimidex (anastrozole) Surgery Lymph node removal: Sentinel; Mastectomy: Left; Reconstruction (left): DIEP flap Surgery Lumpectomy; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Back to gym after DIEP flap? susanlouise susanlouise

Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2011 11:52AM susanlouise wrote: I had bloody discharge from nipple, and it turned out to be DCIS. After 2nd surgery, we see there was also a papilloma in there with the DCIS too. So yes, it can happen, although I understand it's unusual!
Posts.Title: intraductal papilloma/DCIS resaz neochiq
